Destiny Guns was created by Khaos Studios. We are Conner Martin and Robert Gillis. It was created as a project for mobile app development and databases courses at the University of Washington Tacoma. We, Conner and Robert, do not own the rights to any of the intellectual property put forth by Bungie and interpreted by us into our application for entertainment and educational purposes.

As is the nature of this app is statistic based and Bungie will continue to support this ever-changing game, There will undoubtedly be misinformation that we, the devs, will have not intended. If you find any information that is incorrect, please email the CEO of Khaos Studios at connerjm@uw.edu, or follow the steps of filling a bug report below.

To send the devs a bug report, click anywhere along this message to be taken to your mail app and email us a detailed description on the bug or misinformation that you have found, most importantly including how to recreate the bug.
